attributes.action: Appeal to Stop the closure of DFID by MP Boris Johnson
attributes.additional_details: I appeal to PM BORIS JOHNSON and his Government to refrain from this decision
attributes.background: The British Government for a very long time has given hope to poor & developing countries but has also maintained great international partnerships through services offered by DFID. This closure is a threat to international relations.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/327602
